entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
